Dear Colleague, 

 

We are currently experiencing a P1 incident due to an integration failure between MuleSoft and SCE11. All transactions inbound and outbound are currently on hold.

 

Business Impact:

B2B and B2C transactions are affected and may be delayed or altered.

Ongoing business operations relying on SCE11 may face disruption.

 

Status & Next Steps:

The issue has been escalated to the relevant support teams.

Investigation is ongoing with highest priority.

 

Next update will be shared in [30/60] minutes or sooner if significant progress is made.

 

We appreciate your patience and cooperation as we work to enhance your experience with our services.


For support during this period, please raise a ticket via OneReach. You can also check real-time status updates via the Tech&Data System Status & Health <https://onereach.status.freshservice.com/>  Dashboard.
